name: Rubik's® Cube
description:
Play anywhere, anytime on the most authentic digital representation of the Rubik’s Cube available. Rubik's Cube is a 3-D combination puzzle invented in 1974 by Hungarian sculptor and professor of architecture Ernő Rubik.

Game Features:
Intuitive touch controls
Cube 2x2x2 and Cube 3x3x3
Solver
Camera Capture
Internet rankings

The game is developed under the license of the Rubik's Brand Ltd.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
